description:
New building with modern amenities and design. Close to public transit to get to Manhattan in a breeze including N/W trains. The place is spacious and fully furnished with all new amenities. Walking distance to many cool restaurants, bars, grocery stores, coffee shops in eclectic and diverse neighborhood.

Couples who like a quite place, walking distance to great restaurants and bars and only 3 stops from Manhattan.

It's only 10 minutes  from the subway N and W.
name: Modern Apartment...Great Location
